mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( 0, #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{roles}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select um.usercode, um.name, um.username, um.password, um.email, um.roles, ud.money from user_mst um left outer join user_dtl ud on(ud.usercode = um.usercode) where um.username = #{username}
